Class Tarea

java.lang.Object
Tarea
public class Tarea extends Object
Tarea class represents a task in the system with attributes such as name, start date, deadline, task type, description, completion status, and task ID. Provides methods to manage tasks, including adding, editing, displaying, and deleting tasks.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tarea

      public Tarea(String nombre, LocalDateTime inicio, LocalDateTime deadline, TipoTarea tipo, String descripcion, boolean completado, int tareaId)
      Constructor for creating a task with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      nombre - the name of the task
      inicio - the start date and time of the task
      deadline - the deadline of the task
      tipo - the type of the task (e.g., low priority)
      descripcion - the description of the task
      completado - the completion status of the task
      tareaId - the unique ID for the task

  • Method Details

    • guardarBBDD

      public void guardarBBDD(Connection conn, Usuario usuarioLogin) throws SQLException
      Saves the task to the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - the connection to the database
      usuarioLogin - the logged-in user
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query

    • agregarTarea

      public static boolean agregarTarea(List<Tarea> tareas, Scanner scanner, Usuario usuarioLogin)
      Adds a new task by getting details from user input.
      Parameters:
      tareas - the list of tasks to which the new task will be added
      scanner - the scanner for user input
      usuarioLogin - the logged-in user
      Returns:
      true if the task is successfully added / false otherwise

    • parseFecha

      public static LocalDate parseFecha(String fechaStr)
      Parses a string representing a date into a LocalDate object.
      Parameters:
      fechaStr - the string representing the date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
      Returns:
      a LocalDate object representing the parsed date / null if the input is invalid

    • mostrarTareas

      public static void mostrarTareas(List<Tarea> tareas, Scanner scanner, Usuario usuarioLogin)
      Displays a list of tasks.
      Parameters:
      tareas - the list of tasks to be displayed
      scanner - the scanner for user input
      usuarioLogin - the logged-in user

    • mostrarDetalles

      public static String mostrarDetalles(Tarea tarea)
      Displays the details of a task.
      Parameters:
      tarea - the task whose details are to be displayed
      Returns:
      a string representing the formatted task details

    • editarTarea

      public static boolean editarTarea(List<Tarea> tareas, Scanner scanner, Usuario usuarioLogin)
      Edits an existing task based on user input.
      Parameters:
      tareas - the list of tasks to edit
      scanner - the scanner for user input
      usuarioLogin - the logged-in user
      Returns:
      true if the task is successfully edited / false otherwise

    • eliminarTarea

      public static boolean eliminarTarea(List<Tarea> tareas, Scanner scanner, Usuario usuarioLogin)
      Deletes a task based on user input.
      Parameters:
      tareas - the list of tasks to edit
      scanner - the scanner for user input
      usuarioLogin - the logged-in user
      Returns:
      true if the task is successfully deleted / false otherwise
